    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Talismanic Sage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2082) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 195 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Talisman Dabbler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=79)

**Prerequisites**
[Talisman Dabbler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2079)

</column>

---

You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known. Normally, affixing more than one talisman to an item causes the talismans to be suppressed, but when you [Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=520), you can specially treat one item you're working on, allowing it to have two active talismans at once. This special treatment ends if you use Affix a Talisman to treat a new item for this ability.
name: Talismanic Sage
